name: Quick Popovers
directions: Whisk eggs, milk, and 1 tbsp melted butter until smooth and frothy.
Add flour and salt; whisk until bubbly. Let rest while preheating oven to 450°F (232°C).
Place empty popover pan in oven for 10 minutes to heat.
Melt remaining 2 tbsp butter. Brush into hot pan cups.
Fill cups halfway with batter and bake 16 minutes at 450°F (232°C) without opening the door.
Reduce heat to 350°F (177°C) and bake another 16 minutes until puffed, golden, and crisp.
Remove popovers from pan and cool briefly on a rack before serving warm.
